items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: A juicy cheeseburger, a classic American dish.  Melted cheese and savory beef patties, with a delicious taste that everyone will enjoy.

items.name: Cheese sandwich
items.description: A simple but satisfying cheese sandwich.  A perfect blend of flavors from the soft cheese and the bread.

items.name: Chicken burgers
items.description: Crispy chicken patties between soft buns, providing a perfect combination of flavors and textures.

items.name: Spicy chicken
items.description: A spicy chicken dish featuring flavorful chicken cooked with a tantalizing blend of spices.

items.name: Hot dog
items.description: A classic hot dog, featuring savory sausages in a soft bun.  A great choice for a quick and satisfying meal.

items.name: Fruit Salad
items.description: A refreshing fruit salad with a variety of fresh fruits, offering a delightful taste and a burst of natural sweetness.

items.name: Cocktails
items.description: A collection of delightful cocktails featuring various ingredients and flavors.

items.name: Nuggets
items.description: Crispy and flavorful chicken nuggets, perfect for an appetizer or a quick meal.

items.name: Sandwich
items.description: A classic sandwich with various fillings, satisfying the taste buds with a wide array of flavors.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Crispy french fries, a delicious and satisfying side dish.

items.name: Milk Shake
items.description: A refreshing and creamy milk shake, a delightful choice for a cold beverage.

items.name: Iced Tea
items.description: A refreshing iced tea, a perfect beverage on a hot day.

items.name: Orange Juice
items.description: A glass of refreshing orange juice, a source of Vitamin C and natural sweetness.

items.name: Lemon Tea
items.description: A refreshing lemon tea, offering a blend of citrusy and warm flavors.

items.name: Coffee
items.description: A rich and flavorful cup of coffee, a classic morning beverage.
